game.name: ChimpUP!
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ChimpUP! is a chaotic co-op climbing party game where you and your friends race and play minigames. Armed with two independent grapple hooks for arms, compete to the top in a fast-paced fashion. Master the movement, sabotage your friends, race to the top, create cosmetics and maps.
